mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE username = #{username}

SELECT id, password, username, email, (select code_name from code where code_id = city_code) as city_name, city_code, city_etc, (select code_name from code where code_id = role) as role_nm, role, appr_yn FROM member ORDER BY ID ASC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET appr_yn = 'Y', role = 'A' WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE member SET appr_yn = 'N', role = 'G' WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.board_master_code, a.board_master_name, IFNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN b.user_type = 'G' THEN b.read_auth END), 'N') AS G_read_auth, IFNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN b.user_type = 'N' THEN b.read_auth END), 'N') AS N_read_auth, CASE WHEN a.board_master_code NOT IN ('N01', 'N02', 'N03', 'N04', 'N05', 'N06', 'A01') THEN '-' ELSE IFNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN b.user_type = 'N' THEN b.file_auth END), 'N') END AS N_file_auth, CASE WHEN a.board_master_code IN ('B01','B02','B03','B04') THEN '-' ELSE IFNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN b.user_type = 'G' THEN b.update_auth END), 'N') END AS G_update_auth, CASE WHEN a.board_master_code NOT IN ('N01', 'N02', 'N03', 'N04', 'N05', 'N06', 'A01') THEN '-' ELSE IFNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN b.user_type = 'G' THEN b.file_auth END), 'N') END AS G_file_auth, IFNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN b.user_type = 'C' THEN b.read_auth END), 'N') AS C_read_auth, CASE WHEN a.board_master_code IN ('B01','B02','B03','B04') THEN '-' ELSE IFNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN b.user_type = 'C' THEN b.update_auth END), 'N') END AS C_update_auth, CASE WHEN a.board_master_code NOT IN ('N01', 'N02', 'N03', 'N04', 'N05', 'N06', 'A01') THEN '-' ELSE IFNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN b.user_type = 'C' THEN b.file_auth END), 'N') END AS C_file_auth, IFNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN b.user_type = 'O' THEN b.read_auth END), 'N') AS O_read_auth, CASE WHEN a.board_master_code IN ('B01','B02','B03','B04') THEN '-' ELSE IFNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN b.user_type = 'O' THEN b.update_auth END), 'N') END AS O_update_auth, CASE WHEN a.board_master_code NOT IN ('N01', 'N02', 'N03', 'N04', 'N05', 'N06', 'A01') THEN '-' ELSE IFNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN b.user_type = 'O' THEN b.file_auth END), 'N') END AS O_file_auth, board_use_yn FROM board_master a LEFT JOIN board_auth b ON a.board_master_code = b.board_master_code_id GROUP BY a.board_master_code, a.board_master_name ORDER BY a.board_order asc
mapper.update: CALL upsert_board_auth( #{userType, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{boardId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authValue, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT bm.board_master_code FROM board a JOIN board_master bm ON a.board_master_code = bm.board_master_code WHERE a.board_code = #{boardCode}
